polar.description: An object describing the polar diagram of a sailboat.
polar.title: polar

id.description: An unique identifier by which the polar diagram can be recognized

WindSpeedTrue.description: Wind speed over water (as calculated from speedApparent and vessel's speed through water)

angleTrueWater.description: True wind angle based on speed through water, negative to port

polarSpeed.description: The current polar speed based on current polar diagram, WindSpeedTrue and angleTrueWater.
